Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small business enterprises
Summary: Relates to establishing expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small and minority and women-owned business enterprises where there is privity of contract between a minority and women-owned business enterprise and a subcontractor or contractor working on an authority public works contract.
LawCode: Amd §§311 & 313, Exec L; amd §147, St Fin L; amd §1265-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the state finance law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small and minority and women-owned business enterprises
